verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> when <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> was <S%G1230>past,<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> mother of <S%G2385>James,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4539>Salome,<s%> had <S%G59>bought<s%> sweet <S%G759>spices,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G2064>come<s%> and <S%G218>anoint<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3029>very<s%> early in the <S%G4404>morning<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3391>first<s%> day of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G4521>week,<s%> they <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1909>unto<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3419>sepulcher<s%> at the <S%G393>rising<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2246>sun.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they <S%G3004>said<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> shall roll us <S%G617>away<s%> <S%G2254><s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2374>door<s%> of <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3419>sepulcher?<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> when they <S%G308>looked,<s%> they <S%G2334>saw<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3037>stone<s%> was rolled <S%G617>away:<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4970>very<s%> <S%G3173>great.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1525>entering<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3419>sepulcher,<s%> they <S%G1492>saw<s%> a young <S%G3495>man<s%> <S%G2521>sitting<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> right <S%G1188>side,<s%> clothed <S%G4016>in<s%> a long white <S%G4749>garment;<s%> <S%G3022><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they were <S%G1568>affrighted.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588>he<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Be <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1568>affrighted:<s%> Ye <S%G2212>seek<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3479>Nazareth,<s%> which was <S%G4717>crucified:<s%> he is <S%G1453>risen;<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5602>here:<s%> <S%G2396>behold<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> they <S%G5087>laid<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%>

But <S%G235><s%> go your <S%G5217>way,<s%> <S%G2036>tell<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he goeth <S%G4254>before<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee:<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> shall ye <S%G3700>see<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G5213>you.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> they went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G5035>quickly,<s%> and <S%G5343>fled<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3419>sepulcher;<s%> <S%G1161>for<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G5156>trembled<s%> <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G1611>amazed:<s%> <S%G2532>neither<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> they any <S%G3762>thing<s%> to <S%G3762>any<s%> man; <S%G1063>for<s%> they were <S%G5399>afraid.<s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when Jesus was <S%G450>risen<s%> <S%G4404>early<s%> the <S%G4413>first<s%> day of the <S%G4521>week,<s%> he <S%G5316>appeared<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> to <S%G3137>Mary<s%> <S%G3094>Magdalene,<s%> out <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he had <S%G1544>cast<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G1140>devils.<s%>
And <S%G1565>she<s%> <S%G4198>went<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> them that had <S%G1096>been<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> as they <S%G3996>mourned<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2799>wept.<s%>

And <S%G2548>they,<s%> when they had <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he was <S%G2198>alive,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> had been <S%G2300>seen<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G846>her,<s%> believed <S%G569>not.<s%>

After <S%G3326><s%> <S%G5023>that<s%> he <S%G5319>appeared<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G3444>form<s%> unto <S%G1417>two<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> as they <S%G4043>walked,<s%> and <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G68>country.<s%>
And <S%G2548>they<s%> <S%G565>went<s%> and <S%G518>told<s%> it unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3062>residue:<s%> <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> they <S%G1565>them.<s%>

Afterward <S%G5305><s%> he <S%G5319>appeared<s%> unto <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G1733>eleven<s%> as <S%G846>they<s%> sat at <S%G345>meat,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3679>upbraided<s%> them with <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G570>unbelief<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> hardness of <S%G4641>heart,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> they <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> them which had <S%G2300>seen<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> after he was <S%G1453>risen.<s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> Go <S%G4198><s%> ye <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G537>all<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2889>world,<s%> and <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2098>gospel<s%> to <S%G3956>every<s%> creature. <S%G2937><s%>
He that <S%G4100>believeth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> is <S%G907>baptized<s%> shall be <S%G4982>saved;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> he that believeth <S%G569>not<s%> shall be damned. <S%G2632><s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> shall <S%G3877>follow<s%> <S%G3588>them<s%> that <S%G4100>believe;<s%> <S%G1722>In<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> shall they cast <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G1140>devils;<s%> they shall <S%G2980>speak<s%> with <S%G2537>new<s%> tongues; <S%G1100><s%>

They shall take <S%G142>up<s%> <S%G3789>serpents;<s%> and <S%G2579>if<s%> they <S%G4095>drink<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> deadly <S%G2286>thing,<s%> it shall <S%G3364>not<s%> <S%G984>hurt<s%> <S%G846>them;<s%> they shall <S%G2007>lay<s%> <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G732>sick,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they shall recover. <S%G2192><s%> <S%G2573><s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3303>then<s%> <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> had <S%G2980>spoken<s%> unto <S%G846>them,<s%> he was received <S%G353>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G1537>on<s%> the right <S%G1188>hand<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1565>they<s%> went <S%G1831>forth,<s%> and <S%G2784>preached<s%> every <S%G3837>where,<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> working <S%G4903>with<s%> them, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G950>confirming<s%> <S%G3588>the<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G1872>following.<s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
